articles.description: The Queen, Prince Charles, Prince William, Kate Middleton and the rest of the royal family love Christmas, and their day is filled with a lot of festive food - however they now give their staff the day off to spend with their families
articles.content:
This year, the Queen and Prince Philip will be apart from their loved ones as they have a quiet and Covid-safe Christmas in Windsor.
Even though it's not the celebrations they're used to, we're sure… [+3390 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Bullock
articles.title: 'I feel euphoric!' Sir Ian McKellen, 81, safely receives COVID-19 vaccine - Daily Mail
articles.description: Sir Ian McKellen CBE, 81, has safely received the Covid-19 vaccine after the NHS launched its vaccine rollout earlier this month.
articles.content:
Sir Ian McKellen CBE has safely received the COVID-19 vaccine after the NHS launched its vaccine roll-out earlier this month.
